item.title: Obstruction when parking cars in the marked zones which we pay a permit to park., 29th August
item.description:
Grass verge located next to a parking bay, trip hazard when exiting cars, large mound with non visable hole pedestrians would trip/fall and cause injury.

item.title: Failed Repair Centre A40 At Traffic Lights, 28th August
item.description:
For many months there has been a long and deep groove between the west/east bound carriageways large enough to trap and deflect a motorcycle wheel. I noted on passing the other day that contractors had opened this groove to attempt a repair using what is best described as a mix of muesli and liquorice sauce. Needless to add all but a few grains of the entire repair medium had disappeared leaving now a bigger hazard to all vehicles particularly motorcycles. Please insist your contractors use competent materials, not the rubbish I've seen used in Gloucestershire for too many years that last barely a fortnight.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several Potholes in Crossing, 28th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Shipton, Cotswold

item.title: Street Light permanently off, 28th August
item.description:
Street Light opposite 79 Moorend Road Leckhampton GL53 0HB permanently off..... This is Light Post 13..... also Street Light numbered 12 further down Moorend Road towards the mini-roundabout is off. Thank you for your prompt response to our first report of the issue with Post 13...... but unfortunately we are still in darkness!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Moorend Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlight outside No 29 not working, 27th August
item.description:
Streetlight outside 29 Colesbourne Road not working, previous report status changed to 'fixed' today, it isn't fixed. It's very dark in the immediate area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Colesbourne Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
